choiceProducts.title: Сar that we purchase
choiceProducts.text: across all states in the U.S.

contentStep1.stepText: Send us photos and vehicle specifications via your preferred messaging app.

contentStep2.stepText: Schedule an in-office consultation or request an expert evaluation at your location.

contentStep3.stepText: Receive your appraisal and payment through your preferred method.

need-docs.title: To sell your car, you will need:
need-docs.need-docs-asq: Additional paperwork will be required if the auto is:

listAsq.title: Credited:
listAsq.content:
• Loan payoff information
  • Account number and lender's contact information

listAsq.title: Corporate:
listAsq.content:
• Articles of incorporation or business license
  • Letter authorizing the sale on company letterhead
  • Employer Identification Number (EIN)

listAsq.title: Other scenarios that may require additional documentation:
listAsq.content:
• Leased: Lease buyout information and lessor's permission
  • Co-owned: Signatures from all owners listed on the title
  • Inherited: Probate court documents or letters testamentary
  • Out-of-state: Proof of vehicle inspection and emissions testing
  • Salvage title: Salvage certificate and repair documentation
  • Modified: Documentation of significant modifications or aftermarket parts
  • Classic or antique: Historical vehicle registration (if applicable)

list.title: We buy сar in any condition
Trade-In available (exchange for a new vehicle)
We work with complex cases (bail, ban, credit)

choiceMarkCar.title: Select the make of the vehicle

feedback.content: Just sold my Toyota Tundra to these folks in Tampa. They were straight shooters, no BS. Got a fair price and the whole deal was wrapped up in no time. Smooth sailing all the way. Only wish they had a coffee machine in the office, hence the 4 stars.
feedback.name: Jake S.

feedback.content: Had a fender bender with my BMW 3 Series. These guys in Miami came through big time! Their offer was way better than I expected for a banged-up ride. The process was slick, and they handled all the paperwork. Couldn't be happier!
feedback.name: Emily R.

feedback.content: After years of Uber driving, my car was on its last legs. These folks gave me a decent price considering the mileage. The transaction was quick and professional. Appreciate the no-nonsense approach and fair valuation.
feedback.name: Michael T.

listAsq.title: What types of cars do you buy?
listAsq.content:
Our company specializes in purchasing all types of vehicles, from everyday sedans to luxury sports cars. We buy cars, trucks, SUVs, vans, and everything in between, regardless of their condition or history. Whether your vehicle is brand new, gently used, or has seen better days, we're interested. We even purchase cars with complex histories, including accident-involved, repossessed, flood-damaged, or those with legal complications.
We are interested in all makes and models.

listAsq.title: How do you determine the car's value?
listAsq.content: Our online valuation process is streamlined for your convenience. Simply contact us through any messaging platform (Telegram, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger) or social network (Instagram, Facebook) and send us photos along with a brief description (specifications, details, modifications). Within 5-7 minutes, you'll receive a competitive offer and a step-by-step plan for a quick sale.

listAsq.title: Can you buy my financed car?
listAsq.content: Absolutely! We specialize in handling complex financial situations. Whether your car is financed, leased, or even if you're upside down on your loan, we have solutions. Our team of financial experts can work with your lender to pay off your loan and still put cash in your pocket.

listAsq.title: Do you purchase damaged or non-running cars?
listAsq.content: Yes, we buy cars in any condition. From totaled vehicles to cars that won't start, we see value where others don't. Our nationwide network of buyers allows us to find the best use for every vehicle, ensuring you get a fair price regardless of its condition.

listAsq.title: How quickly can I get paid?
listAsq.content: We pride ourselves on our same-day payment guarantee. Once we agree on a price, we can complete the transaction and have cash in your hand within hours. We offer various payment methods to suit your preferences, including instant bank transfers, cashier's checks, or even cash for certain transactions.

listAsq.title: Do you operate throughout the entire United States?
listAsq.content: While our physical network doesn't cover every corner of the U.S., our innovative approach allows us to serve customers nationwide. We utilize a combination of local agents, partner networks, and cutting-edge logistics solutions to ensure we can buy your car no matter where you're located. For most locations, we can have an appraiser at your door within 24-48 hours.
